channel.title: Is this correct?
channel.description:
I tried to make a Junk shop with reldo and it didnt work here is my coding:
[code] } else if (NPCID == 647) {//entrana junk store PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 51; //Junk shop[/code]
And I added this in SHops.cfg
[code]shop = 51 Junk_Shop 1 2 6137 10000 6139 10000 6141 10000 6131 10000 6133 10000 6135 10000 3122 10000 4153 10000 [/code]

item.title: Is this correct?
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

I tried to make a Junk shop with reldo and it didnt work here is my coding:

} else if (NPCID == 647) {//entrana junk store PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 51; //Junk shop

And I added this in SHops.cfg

shop = 51 Junk_Shop 1 2 6137 10000 6139 10000 6141 10000 6131 10000 6133 10000 6135 10000 3122 10000 4153 10000
